item.title: Southwest bends further to activist shareholder Elliott’s demands
item.description: Southwest is in the midst of a transformation that led it to announce Tuesday the first-ever involuntary layoffs.

item.title: Oil prices tick higher on uncertainty over supply
item.description: Oil futures rose Wednesday, finding support on curtailed supply from Russia as traders also monitor talks aimed at ending the war in Ukraine.

item.title: The market is at the last stage of the bull cycle — but that may take a while. Here are three stocks from this value-focused manager.
item.description: Get ready for the “first year of the last leg of the bull run,” says ValueWorks’ Charles Lemonides.

item.title: Philips issues its second straight profit warning on China. The stock is hammered, again.
item.description: Philips shares fell sharply on Wednesday as the Dutch healthcare equipment maker again warned on China and again triggered a big drop in its stock pri...

item.title: Should you be worried about Elon Musk’s DOGE accessing your Social Security information?
